channel.title: Local Obituaries from KTTC.com and Tributes.com
channel.description: Obituaries and Online Obituaries News at Tributes.com. Find Local and National Obituaries News and Personal Tributes. Read Obituaries, Death and Funeral Notices, and Create Obituaries for Loved Ones.

item.title: Ruth Lucille Tollefsrud, 89, Mabel, Minnesota
item.description:
Ruth was born on February 9, 2013 and passed away on Monday, March 11, 2013.
Ruth was a resident of Mabel, Minnesota at the time of her passing. She was formerly from Decorah, Iowa.
She is survived by her husband Charles.
Funeral services will be held at 11:00 a.m., Friday, March 15, 2013, at the Washington Prairie Lutheran Church, 1725 Washington Prairie Road, Decorah, IA, with Rev. Mark Kvale presiding. Burial will be in the church cemetery. Friends may call from 3:00-7:00 p.m.,...
item.author: Tributes.com

item.title: David Donald Demmer, 88, Ellendale, Minnesota
item.description: Funeral services for David Donald Demmer of Ellendale, MN, will be held at 1:00 PM Thursday, March 14, 2013 at the First Lutheran Church in Ellendale. Pastor Richard Sliper will officiate. Visitation will be held one hour prior to the service at the church. Interment will be in the Hartland Cemetery, Hartland, MN. David died on Saturday, March 9, 2013 at the Countryside Senior Living in Owatonna, MN. He was 88 years of age. David was born March 6, 1925 in Freeborn County, the son of William and...

item.title: Donald D. Hart, 85, Decorah, Iowa
item.description:
Donald D. Hart, 85, of Decorah, died Friday, March 8, 2013, at his daughter's home in Cedar Falls.
Services will be held 1:00 p.m. Saturday, March 16, 2013 at St. Benedict Catholic Church in Decorah with burial in St. Benedict Cemetery. Visitation will be for one hour prior to services Saturday at the church. Services will be conducted by Fjelstul Funeral Home in Decorah (563)382-5210.
Memorials may be directed to Cedar Valley Hospice, Waterloo or St. Benedict Catholic Church, Decorah.

item.title: Howard Brua, 85, Albert Lea, Minnesota
item.description: Memorial services for Howard G. Brua will be held on Tuesday, March 12, 2013 at 2PM at First Lutheran Church in Albert Lea. Pastor Al Stoa will officiate.
